text: Ballochia amoena is a species of plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Socotra amoena Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Ballochia amoena
